text.tspan: Array of Nodes. Nodes are parent child using index into array
Add parent first to limit search to
leaf is the index into the CSV budget Acct
fn rtn_tree() is hard coded, make it recursive.
The Node stay fixed, only the state & val changes
val: is f64, native JS numeric format.
the total is locked so it does not change.
Parent value must match the sum of the chindren.
Change in parent effects the children proportionally
.....the rest of the tree must change negitive proportionally
Node val must not go negitive.
